description: The AWS::SecurityHub::AggregatorV2 resource represents the AWS Security Hub AggregatorV2 in your account. One aggregatorv2 resource is created for each account in non opt-in region in which you configure region linking mode.

Region.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,32}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with the Security Hub V2 resource.

^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with the Security Hub V2 resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AggregatorV2Arn.description: The ARN of the AggregatorV2 being created and assigned as the unique identifier
AggregatorV2Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the AggregatorV2 being created and assigned as the unique identifier

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws\S*:securityhub:\S*  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

RegionLinkingMode.description: Indicates to link a list of included Regions
RegionLinkingMode.markdownDescription:
Indicates to link a list of included Regions

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SPECIFIED_REGIONS  
Update requires: No interruption

LinkedRegions.markdownDescription:
The list of included Regions

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AggregationRegion.description: The aggregation Region of the AggregatorV2
AggregationRegion.markdownDescription:
The aggregation Region of the AggregatorV2
